signal_description: From the table 'defaultview-222', get the sum of all values in the 'AR_CountOpenDocuments' column.
llm_output:

{
  "signal_description": "From the table 'defaultview-222', get the sum of all values in the 'AR_CountOpenDocuments' column."

To generate this summary, I first identified the key components of the query:

- SELECT: indicates that values will be retrieved
- SUM(): an aggregate function that sums the values
- "AR_CountOpenDocuments": the name of the column whose values will be summed
- FROM "defaultview-222": specifies the table name to retrieve data from

I then composed a simple sentence summarizing each component in plain language:

- From the table 'defaultview-222' 
- get the sum of all values in the 'AR_CountOpenDocuments' column

By combining these plain language descriptions, I was able to generate a human-readable summary of what the query is doing.
